summary: Completed comprehensive testing of corporate login portal clone. Fixed critical JWT token verification issue. All core authentication features working correctly.

fixed_issues.issue: JWT token verification failing with 'Invalid token' error
fixed_issues.root_cause: JWT 'sub' field was integer instead of required string format
fixed_issues.fix_applied: Changed user['id'] to str(user['id']) in token creation

design_issues.issue: Carousel should be hidden on mobile viewport but CSS media query may not be working correctly
Logout works but redirect detection times out in tests

passed_tests: User info display on admin page
All form elements present and clickable
Error message display for invalid login
